name: Mayor's Destiny
description:
Mayor’s Destiny is a 2D text-based management game. That we created for our final assignment.

 

Story of the game

Since the President of Mesudiye Municipality has passed away, we are an interim mayor appointed until the next election. The management of the municipality is in your hands for 1 month. For a month, you need to make decisions for various situations and manage this temporary period.

 

Flow of the game

The player receives an e-mail and learns the story.

In the game, there are some situations when the player must decide via e-mails. The player must try not to let the elements reach maximum and minimum point while making decisions. If the player finishes all the situations and manages to keep the elements in balance, the game ends with a good ending.
